articles.author: France 24
articles.title: US Moon lander 'permanently' asleep after historic landing: company - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: An uncrewed American lander that became the first private spaceship on the Moon has met its ultimate end after failing to "wake up," the company that built it said.
articles.content: Washington (AFP) An uncrewed American lander that became the first private spaceship on the Moon has met its ultimate end after failing to "wake up," the company that built it said. Houston-based Int… [+2070 chars]
